modName: The Elder Scrolls V Rewritten - Blackguard
summary: Changes Glover Mallory's "Blackguard's Armour" into a much more unique and effective suit of armour; something worthy of a true guildmaster.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/ORM02-LogoNexus.png[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/Sec-Description.png[/img][/center]

Unique should mean unique.

Bethesda in their infinite wisdom created a new form of Thieves Guild armour called the "Blackguard's Armour", though with no real backround or lore regarding the set, or anything else to identify it. 'Dragonborn Rewritten: Blackguard' gives this new armour a new model based on Letho's armour from "The Witcher : Assassins of Kings" by CD Projekt Red, along with stats that sit above the Guild Master's armour, though below those of Mercer Frey's set.

Plays best with the "Dark Pouches" from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438]'Bandolier - Bags and Pouches' by Dragten[/url]

[center][img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/Sec-Requirements.png[/img][/center]

[img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/ESRW/Common/Bullet.png[/img]The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

[img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/ESRW/Common/Bullet.png[/img]The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim: Dragonborn (DLC)

[center][img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/Sec-Issues.png[/img][/center]

[img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/ESRW/Common/Bullet.png[/img]At present there is no female version of the mod; L0rd0fWar seems to have a female conversion in the works, but it has not yet been released to the public.

[center][img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/Sec-Incompatibilities.png[/img][/center]

[img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/ESRW/Common/Bullet.png[/img]Any mod that alters the Blackguard's armour.

[center][img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/Sec-Changelog.png[/img][/center]

1.0.0:
[img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/ESRW/Common/Bullet.png[/img] Initial Release

[center][img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/Sec-Usage.png[/img][/center]

This plugin may not be uploaded to any distribution site without my permission. In the event that this plugin is removed from Nexus, this plugin may be uploaded to any distribution site without my permission, with the exception of Steamworks, so long as the files contained within remain unchanged.

[center][img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/Sec-Contact.png[/img][/center]

If you need to reach me, you can contact me on the Skyrim Real Estate forums, under the name Oriius (my email is in my profile), or through my website at www.ndavidteixeira.com

[center][img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/Sec-Thanks.png[/img][/center]

[img]http://www.ndavidteixeira.com/images/Oriius/TESV/ESRW/Common/Bullet.png[/img]The fine community at Nexus for supporting and downloading mods like this.
